trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for controls that reside in <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> zones and are used to edit <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: Actúa como clase base de los controles que residen en zonas <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> y se usan para editar controles <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class provides a base set of properties and methods that are used by the derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls provided with the Web Parts control set, and by custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> clase proporciona un conjunto básico de propiedades y métodos que se usan por la clase derivada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controles que se proporcionan con el conjunto de controles de elementos Web y personalizada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controles.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control allows a user to edit an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control by modifying its layout, appearance, properties, behavior, or other characteristics.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control permite al usuario editar asociada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control modificando su diseño, aspecto, propiedades, comportamiento u otras características.

trans-unit.source: The editing user interface (UI), which consists of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zones that contain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, is displayed after a Web page enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: La interfaz de usuario de edición (IU), que consta de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zonas que contienen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controla, se muestra después de una página Web entra en modo de edición.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control can be used only within a zone that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> class, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control puede usarse únicamente dentro de una zona que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> de la clase, como el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control.

trans-unit.source: After a page has entered edit mode, a user can select a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control to edit by clicking an edit verb on the verbs menu of the selected control.
trans-unit.target: Después de que una página ha entrado en modo de edición, un usuario puede seleccionar una <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control para editar, haga clic en un verbo de edición en el menú de verbos del control seleccionado.

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control can be edited at a time.
trans-unit.target: Solo un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> se puede modificar el control a la vez.

trans-unit.source: Several derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls are provided with the Web Parts control set, as listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Varios derivado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controles se proporcionan con el conjunto de controles de elementos Web, como se muestra en la tabla siguiente.

trans-unit.source: These controls provide all the editing capabilities that are necessary for most applications.
trans-unit.target: Estos controles proporcionan todas las capacidades de edición que son necesarias para la mayoría de las aplicaciones.

trans-unit.source: The typical approach for using these controls in a Web Parts page is to declare them in page persistence format within a `<zonetemplate>` element, where `<zonetemplate>` is the child element of an `<asp:editorzone>` element.
trans-unit.target: El enfoque típico para utilizar estos controles en una página de elementos Web consiste en declararlos en formato de persistencia de página dentro de un `<zonetemplate>` elemento, donde `<zonetemplate>` es el elemento secundario de un `<asp:editorzone>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the Example section of this topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener un ejemplo de código, vea la sección ejemplo de este tema.

trans-unit.source: Type of control
trans-unit.target: Tipo de control

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Descripción

trans-unit.source: Edits the appearance of the associated control, including properties such as its title text, height, width, and border attributes.
trans-unit.target: Edita la apariencia del control asociado, incluidas las propiedades, como su texto de título, alto, ancho y los atributos de borde.

trans-unit.source: Edits certain behaviors of the associated control, such as whether it can be edited, whether it can be closed, or whether it can be moved to another zone.
trans-unit.target: Edita ciertos comportamientos del control asociado, por ejemplo, si se puede editar, si puede cerrarse o si se puede mover a otra zona.

trans-unit.source: This control is only visible on a page when a control is being edited in shared personalization scope.
trans-unit.target: Este control solo está visible en la página cuando un control se está editando en el ámbito de personalización compartido.

trans-unit.source: Edits layout attributes for the associated control, such as whether it is in a normal or minimized (collapsed) state, and what zone it is placed in.
trans-unit.target: Ediciones de atributos de diseño para el control asociado, por ejemplo, si está en un estado normal o minimizado (contraído), y en qué zona se coloca en.

trans-unit.source: Edits properties of the associated control, if those properties were declared in the source code with a `WebBrowsable` attribute.
trans-unit.target: Edita las propiedades del control asociado, si dichas propiedades se declararon en el código fuente con una `WebBrowsable` atributo.

trans-unit.source: To improve accessibility, all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls provided in the Web Parts control set are rendered within a `<fieldset>` element.
trans-unit.target: Para mejorar la accesibilidad, todos los <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controla proporcionados en los elementos Web de conjunto de controles se representan dentro de un `<fieldset>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The `<fieldset>` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in a given <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software).
trans-unit.target: El `<fieldset>` elemento agrupa el conjunto relacionado de controles que se utilizan para su edición en un determinado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control y facilita la navegación con pestañas entre dichos controles para los agentes de usuario visuales (por ejemplo, los exploradores Web ordinarios) y agentes de usuario orientados a voz (por ejemplo, el software de lectura de pantalla).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar mediante declaración y mediante programación de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controles.

trans-unit.source: This code example has four parts:
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código tiene cuatro partes:

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: Un control de usuario que permite cambiar los modos de presentación en una página de elementos Web.

trans-unit.source: A Web page that contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control, with several of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls from the Web Parts control set declared in the zone, and a reference to a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Una página Web que contiene un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control, con algunas de las <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controles desde el control de elementos Web establecido declarado en la zona y una referencia a una personalizada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.

trans-unit.source: A class that contains the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control for editing a property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Una clase que contiene la custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control y un personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control para editar una propiedad en el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser.
trans-unit.target: Explicación de cómo funciona el ejemplo cuando se carga la página en un explorador.

trans-unit.source: The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: La primera parte de este ejemplo de código es el control de usuario que permite a los usuarios cambiar los modos de presentación en una página Web.

trans-unit.source: For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de modos de presentación y una descripción del código fuente de este control, vea [Tutorial: cambiar modos de mostrar en una página de elementos Web](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the Web page.
trans-unit.target: La segunda parte del ejemplo de código es la página Web.

trans-unit.source: It contains a declarative reference to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control, with a child `<zonetemplate>` element that contains declarative references to two of the Web Parts control set <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Contiene una referencia declarativa a un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control, con un elemento secundario `<zonetemplate>` elemento que contiene referencias declarativas a dos del conjunto de controles de elementos Web <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controles.

trans-unit.source: The page also references a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, using a `Register` directive for the assembly, and the `<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>` element for the control.
trans-unit.target: La página también hace referencia a una personalizada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlar, mediante un `Register` la directiva para el ensamblado y el `<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>` elemento del control.

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example is a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class named `TextDisplayWebPart`.
trans-unit.target: La tercera parte del ejemplo de código es un personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> clase denominada `TextDisplayWebPart`.

trans-unit.source: The class implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable> interface.
trans-unit.target: La clase implementa la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable> interfaz.

trans-unit.source: Within this class is a nested, private class that contains the code for a private <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class associated with the `TextDisplayWebPart` class and named `TextDisplayEditorPart`.
trans-unit.target: Dentro de esta clase es una clase anidada privada que contiene el código para una privada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> clase asociada a la `TextDisplayWebPart` clase y denominado `TextDisplayEditorPart`.

trans-unit.source: At run time, as the `TextDisplayWebPart` control enters edit mode, in its `TextDisplayWebPart.CreateEditorParts` method, it creates an instance of the `TextDisplayEditorPart` class, and displays it in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control, along with the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Durante la ejecución, como el `TextDisplayWebPart` control entra en modo de edición, en su `TextDisplayWebPart.CreateEditorParts` método, crea una instancia de la `TextDisplayEditorPart` clase y lo muestra en el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control, junto con las demás <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controles.

trans-unit.source: Load the page in a browser, and on the **Display Mode** control, select **Edit Mode** to switch to edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Cargar la página en un explorador y, en la **modo de presentación** control, seleccione **del modo de edición** para cambiar al modo de edición.

trans-unit.source: Click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control.
trans-unit.target: Haga clic en el menú de verbos (la flecha hacia abajo) en la barra de título de la `TextDisplayWebPart` de control y haga clic en **editar** para el control de edición.

trans-unit.source: When the editing UI is visible, you can see three <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, including the custom one that enables you to edit the `TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle` property.
trans-unit.target: Cuando la interfaz de usuario de edición está visible, puede ver tres <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controles, incluida la personalizado que permite editar el `TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle` propiedad.

trans-unit.source: If you make some changes in the editing UI and click the **Apply** button, you can use the drop-down list control to return the page to browse mode and see the full effect of the editing changes.
trans-unit.target: Si realiza algunos cambios en la interfaz de usuario de edición y haga clic en el **aplicar** botón, puede utilizar el control de lista desplegable para devolver la página al modo de exploración y ver el efecto completo de los cambios de edición.

trans-unit.source: To create a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control, you must override two important methods.
trans-unit.target: Para crear un personalizado <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> (control), debe invalidar dos métodos importantes.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges" /> method applies changes made in the editor control to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control being edited.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges" /> método aplica los cambios realizados en el control de editor para el <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control que se está editando.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges" /> method gets the current values of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control being edited, so that the editor control can edit them.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges" /> método obtiene los valores actuales de la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> de control que se está editando, para que el control del editor puede modificarlos.

trans-unit.source: Using these two critical methods, you get and set values between your custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control and the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control it is editing.
trans-unit.target: Mediante estos dos métodos más críticos, obtener y establecer valores entre su personalizado <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control y el <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control está editando.

trans-unit.source: If you derive from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> class to create custom editor controls, you can add your custom controls to an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> zone by implementing the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable" /> interface in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control, a user control, or a server control.
trans-unit.target: Si deriva de la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> de clases para crear controles de editor personalizado, puede agregar los controles personalizados para un <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> zona mediante la implementación de la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable" /> interfaz en un <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control, un control de usuario o un control de servidor.

trans-unit.source: For more details and a code example, see the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable" /> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información y un ejemplo de código, vea la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable" /> Introducción a la clase.

trans-unit.source: Also, the code example in the Example section demonstrates how to implement <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable" /> in a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Además, el ejemplo de código en la sección ejemplo muestra cómo implementar <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable" /> en un personalizado <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa la clase para que la use una instancia de la clase heredada.

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be called only by an inherited class.
trans-unit.target: A este constructor sólo lo puede llamar una clase heredada.

trans-unit.source: Saves the values in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Guarda los valores de un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> en las propiedades correspondientes del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> asociado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the action of saving values from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si la acción de guardar los valores del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> en el control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> se realiza correctamente; en caso contrario (si se produce un error), es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method is a critical method on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> método es un método crítico en un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.

trans-unit.source: It is defined as an abstract method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and must be implemented by inherited controls.
trans-unit.target: Se define como un método abstracto en la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> clase y debe implementarse mediante controles heredados.

trans-unit.source: The method's purpose is to save the values a user has entered into an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control to the corresponding properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that is referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El propósito del método es guardar los valores de un usuario ha escrito en un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control a las propiedades correspondientes en la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control que se hace referencia en el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> método se llama cuando el usuario hace clic en un botón que representa un verbo Aceptar o aplicar en la interfaz de usuario (UI) de edición.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo implementar el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> método en un personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para el código completo necesario para ejecutar el ejemplo, vea la sección ejemplo de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> Introducción a la clase.

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example demonstrates the implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method in the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class named `TextDisplayEditorPart`.
trans-unit.target: La primera parte del ejemplo de código muestra la implementación de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> método personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> clase denominada `TextDisplayEditorPart`.

trans-unit.source: This method gets a reference to the associated `TextDisplayWebPart` control using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este método obtiene una referencia al objeto asociado `TextDisplayWebPart` controlar mediante la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: It then updates the value of the `TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle` property.
trans-unit.target: A continuación, actualiza el valor de la `TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle` propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example shows how the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, creates a collection of associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls (in this case, there is only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control named `TextDisplayEditorPart` in the collection) in its implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: La segunda parte del ejemplo de código muestra cómo asociado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> (control), `TextDisplayWebPart`, crea una colección de asociado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controles (en este caso, solo hay un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control denominado `TextDisplayEditorPart` en la colección) en su implementación de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: This method is executed when the `TextDisplayWebPart` control enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Este método se ejecuta cuando el `TextDisplayWebPart` control entra en modo de edición.

trans-unit.source: A class that derives from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> class must implement the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Una clase que deriva de la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> clase debe implementar la <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges" /> método.

trans-unit.source: The implemented method gets a reference to the associated control using the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit" /> property, and then updates the properties of that control with the current values in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: El método implementado Obtiene una referencia al control asociado con el <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit" /> propiedad y, a continuación, actualiza las propiedades de ese control con los valores actuales de la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si se debe mostrar un control cuando su control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> asociado está en modo de edición.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Un valor booleano que indica si debe mostrarse el control.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: At certain points in the editing process, the zone that contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> property to determine whether to display the control.
trans-unit.target: En ciertos puntos en la edición procesar, la zona que contiene un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controlar las comprobaciones de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> propiedad para determinar si se debe mostrar el control.

trans-unit.source: There are two scenarios where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> property returns `false` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hay dos escenarios donde la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> propiedad devuelve `false` y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> no se muestra el control.

trans-unit.source: The first scenario occurs when the control being edited is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: El primer escenario se produce cuando el control que se está editando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> control.

trans-unit.source: The second scenario occurs when the control being edited has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> properties set to `true`, while the page's personalization scope is set at user level.
trans-unit.target: El segundo escenario se produce cuando el control que se está editando tiene su <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> propiedades establecidas en `true`, mientras que el ámbito de personalización de la página se establece en el nivel de usuario.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that contains the title text displayed in the title bar of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una cadena que contiene el texto del título mostrado en la barra de título de un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the complete, visible title of the control.
trans-unit.target: Cadena que representa el título completo, visible, del control.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a calculated, culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es una cadena calculada, específica de la referencia cultural, suministrada por .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.DisplayTitle%2A> property returns either the current value of the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property or, if the control has no title, a calculated value.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.DisplayTitle%2A> propiedad devuelve el valor actual de la base de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> propiedad o, si el control no tiene ningún título, un valor calculado.

trans-unit.source: The calculated value consists of a localizable resource string for untitled controls.
trans-unit.target: El valor calculado consta de una cadena de recursos localizable para los controles sin título.

trans-unit.source: In the cases where no value is assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.DisplayTitle%2A> property differs from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: En los casos donde se asigna ningún valor a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> propiedad, el valor de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.DisplayTitle%2A> propiedad difiere de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.DisplayTitle%2A> property is designed to be a read-only, calculated property to get the actual current value of the displayed title at run time, do not attempt to use this property to set a title for an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Dado que la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.DisplayTitle%2A> propiedad está diseñada para ser de solo lectura, una propiedad calculada para obtener el valor actual real del título mostrado en tiempo de ejecución, no intente utilizar esta propiedad para establecer un título para un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.

trans-unit.source: To set a title, use the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para establecer un título, utilice la base de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the current state of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control's parent zone.
trans-unit.target: Recupera el estado actual de una zona primaria de un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that has the current state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> zone that contains an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> que tiene el estado actual de la zona <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> que contiene un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.GetDesignModeState%2A> method returns information about the state of the zone that contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.GetDesignModeState%2A> método devuelve información sobre el estado de la zona que contiene un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.

trans-unit.source: The state information is returned in the form of a dictionary.
trans-unit.target: La información de estado se devuelve en forma de un diccionario.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera el evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" />.

trans-unit.source: In addition to calling the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> method, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.OnPreRender%2A> method also checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Además de llamar a la base de <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> método, el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.OnPreRender%2A> método también comprueba los <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `false`, meaning that the control should not be displayed, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> property is also set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Si el valor es `false`, lo que significa que no se debe mostrar el control, la <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> propiedad también se establece en `false`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> que contiene el control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that contains state data for displaying the zone.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> que contiene datos de estado para mostrar la zona.

trans-unit.source: Applies the characteristics of the design-mode state to the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> zone that contains an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Aplica las características del estado del modo de diseño a la zona <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> actual que contiene un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" />.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property values from a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control for its associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene los valores de propiedad de un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> correspondientes a su control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method is a critical method on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> método es un método crítico en un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.

trans-unit.source: It is defined as an abstract method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and must be implemented by inherited controls.
trans-unit.target: Se define como un método abstracto en la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> clase y debe implementarse mediante controles heredados.

trans-unit.source: The purpose of the method is to retrieve the current values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property, and update the fields in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control with those values so a user can edit them.
trans-unit.target: El propósito del método es recuperar los valores actuales de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control al que hace referencia en el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> propiedad y actualizar los campos en el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control con esos valores para que un usuario pueda editarlos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method is called whenever the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control might have changed.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> se llama al método cada vez que los valores de los asociados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> podría haber cambiado el control.

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone that contains the control calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method immediately after calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method, so that the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control are always synchronized with the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Para cada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> (control), el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zona que contiene las llamadas de control el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> método inmediatamente después de llamar a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> método, para que los valores de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control siempre están sincronizadas con los valores de los asociados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.

trans-unit.source: Another case where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method is called is when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is entering edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Otro caso donde el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> se llama al método es cuando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control está entrando en modo de edición.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method is not called after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method if that method returns `false`, because in that case, an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> método no se llama después de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> método si el método devuelve `false`, porque en ese caso, se ha producido un error.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo implementar el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> método en un personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para el código completo necesario para ejecutar el ejemplo, vea la sección ejemplo de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> Introducción a la clase.

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example demonstrates the implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method in the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class named `TextDisplayEditorPart`.
trans-unit.target: La primera parte del ejemplo de código muestra la implementación de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> método personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> clase denominada `TextDisplayEditorPart`.

trans-unit.source: This method gets a reference to the associated `TextDisplayWebPart` control using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este método obtiene una referencia al objeto asociado `TextDisplayWebPart` controlar mediante la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: It then gets the value of the `TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle` property, and updates which item is selected in the drop-down list control (referenced by the `TextDisplayEditorPart.PartContentFontStyle` property) on the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: A continuación, obtiene el valor de la `TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle` propiedad y las actualizaciones de qué elemento está seleccionado en el control de lista desplegable (al que hace referencia el `TextDisplayEditorPart.PartContentFontStyle` propiedad) en personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example shows how the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, creates a collection of associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls (in this case, there is only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control named `TextDisplayEditorPart` in the collection) in its implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: La segunda parte del ejemplo de código muestra cómo asociado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> (control), `TextDisplayWebPart`, crea una colección de asociado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controles (en este caso, solo hay un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control denominado `TextDisplayEditorPart` en la colección) en su implementación de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: This method is executed when the `TextDisplayWebPart` control enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Este método se ejecuta cuando el `TextDisplayWebPart` control entra en modo de edición.

trans-unit.source: A class that derives from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> class must implement the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Una clase que deriva de la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> clase debe implementar la <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges" /> método.

trans-unit.source: The implemented method gets a reference to the associated control using the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit" /> property, and then updates the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control with the property values from the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: El método implementado Obtiene una referencia al control asociado con el <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit" /> propiedad y, a continuación, las actualizaciones de la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control con los valores de propiedad desde el asociado <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control associated with the current Web page.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una referencia al control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> asociado a la página Web actual.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> on the page.
trans-unit.target: Una referencia a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> en la página.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control needs a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> instance because it must check the current personalization scope of the page to determine the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control necesita una referencia a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> instancia porque debe comprobar el ámbito de personalización actual de la página para determinar el valor de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Personalization scope is determined by checking the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A> property, which is accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ámbito de personalización se determina mediante la comprobación de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A> propiedad, que se obtiene acceso a través de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control that is currently being edited.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una referencia al control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> que se está editando.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that is currently in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> que está actualmente en modo de edición.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control (or other server or user control) that is currently being edited corresponds to the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control (u otro control de usuario o servidor) que está editando corresponde al valor de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control can be edited at a time, and when a control is in edit mode, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property provides a reference to that control.
trans-unit.target: Solo un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control puede modificarse a la vez, y cuando un control está en modo de edición, el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> propiedad proporciona una referencia a ese control.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone has added the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control to its collection of controls, it then assigns the value of its own <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.WebPartToEdit%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Después de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zona agregada la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control a la colección de controles, a continuación, asigna el valor de su propio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.WebPartToEdit%2A> propiedad a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> propiedad en el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property especially in its two critical methods--<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>--to get and set the property values on the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control usa la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> propiedad especialmente en sus dos métodos más críticos--<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>: para obtener y establecer los valores de propiedad en el control asociado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> zone that contains an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una referencia a la zona <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> que contiene un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> that contains the control.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> que contiene el control.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Zone%2A> property is read-only, it provides a reference to the zone object that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control, and you can programmatically change property values on the zone itself.
trans-unit.target: Aunque la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Zone%2A> propiedad es de solo lectura, proporciona una referencia al objeto de zona que contiene el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control y se pueden cambiar mediante programación los valores de propiedad en la misma zona.
